st: Befawa Zamana Hai Aitbaar Mat Karna
s:
Befawa Zamana Hai Aitbaar Mat Karna
Doston Par Bhi Apne Dil Nisar Mat Karna
Milna Doston Se Apne Begaraz Hokar Tum
Dosti Ke Daman Ko Tar-Tar Mat Karna
Dil Ki Baat Logon Ke Lab Par Aa Hi Jaati Hai
Tum Kisi Ko Bhi Apna Raazdaar Mat Karna
Aarzoo Mein Jine Ki Maut Ko Bhula Baitho
Zindagi Se Tum Hargiz Itna Pyar Mat Karna

st: Kuch Main B Thak Gya Use Dhondte Hoye
s:
Kuch Main B Thak Gya Use Dhondte Hoye
Kuch Zindgi K Pas B Muhlat Nahi Rahi
Us Ki Her Ik Ada Se Jahlakne Laga Khloos
Jab Muj Ko Aitbaar Ki Aadat Nahi Rahi

st: Aap Ka Aitbar Kaun Kare
s:
Aap Ka Aitbar Kaun Kare
Hashar Ka Intezar Kaun Kare
Baad Mai Phir Khizaa Ka Hai Khutka
Arzoo'e Bahaar Kaun Kare
Yak Baik Phair Li Nazar Tum Ne
Tum Per Ab Aitbaar Kaun Kare
Din Hai Tareek Jab Nigahoon Mai
Farq Leel-O-Nahar Kaun Kare

st: Hatho Ki Lakiro Ka Aibar Kar Lena,
s:
Hatho Ki Lakiro Ka Aibar Kar Lena,
Bharosa Ho To Had Ko Paar Kr Lena,
Khona Pana To Nasibo Ka Khel H,
Dil Ko Jo Apna Lge Bs Ussi Se Pyar Kr Lena

st: Tere Waadey Par Jiye Hum To Yeh Jaan Jhuth Jaanan
s:
Tere Waadey Par Jiye Hum To Yeh Jaan Jhuth Jaanan
Ke Khushi Se Mar Nah Jaate Aghar Aitbaar Hota

st: Zindagi Mein Hamesha Naye Log Milenge
s:
Zindagi Mein Hamesha Naye Log Milenge
Kahin Zyada To Kahin Kam Milenge
Aitbaar Zara Soch Kar Karna
Mumkin Nahin Har Jagah Tumhe Hum Milenge..

st: Waade Pe Woh Mere Aitbaar Nahi Karte
s:
Waade Pe Woh Mere Aitbaar Nahi Karte
Hum Zikare Mohabbat Ka Saare-Bazaar Nahi Karte
Darta Hai Dil Unki Ruswai Se
Aur Woh Soachte Hai Ki Hum Unse Pyaar Nahi Karte

st: Kaatil Par Aitbaar Kiya Hai Kabhi Kabhi
s:
Kaatil Par Aitbaar Kiya Hai Kabhi Kabhi
Yun Khud Ko Bekraar Kiya Hai Kabhi Kabhi
Apne Chiraag Auron Ke Ghar Mein Jala Diye
Yun Roshini Se Pyar Kiya Hai Kabhi Kabhi
Humse Junoon-E-Ishq Ka Aalam Na Poochiye
Apna Hi Intzaar Kiya Hai Kabhi Kabhi

st: Sabi Log Tau Kabi Ache Nai Rehte
s:
Sabi Log Tau Kabi Ache Nai Rehte
Jin Se Sach Sekha He Wo Bi Sache Nai Rehte
Kuin Asia Hota He Aitbar Ki Dehlez Par
Jo Buht Apne Hon Akhsar Apne Nai Rehte

st: Sab Kuch Jantay Hooay Bhi Dil Maanta Na Tha
s:
Sab Kuch Jantay Hooay Bhi Dil Maanta Na Tha
Hum Janay Aitbar Kay Kis Merhalay Mein Thay

st: Mil Mil Ke Bicharrna Mujhe Accha Nahi Lagta
s:
Mil Mil Ke Bicharrna Mujhe Accha Nahi Lagta
Per Tum Ko Bhi Paane Ka Raasta Nahi Milta
Tere Khaloos-E- Mohabbat Pe Atebaar Hai Itna
Siwa Tere Koi Rishta Sacha Nahi Lagta

st: Wade Kisise Irade Kisi Se
s:
Wade Kisise Irade Kisi Se
Anhe Kise Se Nigahe Kisi Se
Ab Yaar Tumhra Bharosa Hi Kya
Jo Adhe Hamare Adhe Kisi Ke
Bhool Kar Be Na Sochna
Meri Chahtein Tere Sang Nahi
Tere Bin Odaas Hai Dil Mera
Meri Zindgi Ma Koi Rang Nahi

st: Kisi Na Kisi Pe Kisi Ko Aetbaar Ho Jata Hai
s:
Kisi Na Kisi Pe Kisi Ko Aetbaar Ho Jata Hai
Ajnabi Koi Shaks Yaar Ho Jata Hai
Khubiyon Se Nahin Hoti Mohabbat Sadaa
Khamiyon Se Bhi Aksar Pyar Ho Jata Hai

st: Mausam Ka Aitabar Zayada Nahi Kiya
s:
Mausam Ka Aitabar Zayada Nahi Kiya
So Hum Ne Us Se Pyar Zayada Nahi Kiya
Kuch To Faraz Humne Palatnay Me Dair Ki
Or Kuch Us Ne B Intizar Zayada Nahi Kiya

st: Itni Aasani Se Na Karna Kisi Pe Aitbaar
s:
Itni Aasani Se Na Karna Kisi Pe Aitbaar
Ye Ek Haseen Dhokha Hai Jise Log Kehte Hain Pyaar
Ye To Adaon Ka Jaadu Hai Jiske Hum Hote Hain Shikar
Ye Wo Kaid Hai Jisme Rihayi Bhi Nahi Milti Hai Yaar
Wo Laut Kar Fir Na Aayegi Is Dil Ko Mujhe Smajhana Hai
Jo Pal Saath Bitaye Humne Un Palon Ko Bhulana Hai
Main Kya Karu Jo Uski Yaad Is Dil Se Jaati Nahi
Kaise Samjhau Is Dil Ko Jo Is Shamma Ka Aaj Bhi Parwana Hai

st: Hum Woh Hai Jo Pyar Main Loot Gaye
s:
Hum Woh Hai Jo Pyar Main Loot Gaye
Sahil Ke Ithna Nazdeek Aakar Bhi Doob Gaye
Un Par Aitabaar Karne Ki Bhool Jo Kardi
Hamare Sare Sapne Toot Gaye

st: Yeh Jhuki Jhuki Aankhein
s:
Yeh Jhuki Jhuki Aankhein
Yeh Ruka Ruka Lehja
Lab Pe Baar Baar Aa K
Toot'ta Hua Fiqra
Gard Me Ati Palkein
Dhoop Se Tapaa Chehra
Sar Jhukaaye Aaya Ha
Ik Umr Ka Bhoola ..
Dil Hazaar Kehta Ha
Hath Thaam Loon Uska
Choom Loon Yeh Peshaani
Lautne Na Doon Usko
Koi Dil Se Kehta Ha
Saare Harf Jhoote Hain
Aitbaar Mat Karna!
Aitbaar Mat Karna!

st: Har Baat Jantey Hoye Bhi Dil Maanta Na Tha
s:
Har Baat Jantey Hoye Bhi Dil Maanta Na Tha
Hum Jaaney Aitbaar Key Kis Marhaley Mein They

st: Us Ajnabi Ka Yun Na Intzaar Karo
s:
Us Ajnabi Ka Yun Na Intzaar Karo
Is Aashiq Dil Ka Na Aitbaar Karo
Roj Nikla Kare Kisi Ki Yaad Me Ansu
Itna Kabhi Kisi Se Na Pyaar Karo

st: Woh Keh Gaye Ki Mera Intezaar Mat Karna,
s:
Woh Keh Gaye Ki Mera Intezaar Mat Karna,
Main Kahu Bhi To Muj Pe Aitbaar Mat Karna,
Wo Kehte Hai Ke Mujhe Tumse Mohabaat Nahi,
Par Tum Kisi Aur Se Pyaar Mat Karna…!!!

st: Haan Main Ne Aitbaar Ker Liya Hai
s:
Haan Main Ne Aitbaar Ker Liya Hai
Zameen Se Asmaan Tak Ka Safer
Asaan Nahi Hai
Lakin Main Ne Ye Safer
Ikhtiyaar Kar Liya Hai
Khud Ko Azaab-e-Jaan Main
Giraftaar Ker Lia Hai
Haan…!!
Main Ne Mohabbat Pe Aitbaar Ker Liya Hai

st: Hawaon Ka Bharosa Na Kijiye
s:
Hawaon Ka Bharosa Na Kijiye
Apna Dil Kisi Ko Na Dijiye
Bewafai Hai Insaan Ki Fitrat
Aitbaar Toofano Ka Na Kijiye

st: Us Ajnabi Ka Youn Na Intezaar Karo
s:
Us Ajnabi Ka Youn Na Intezaar Karo
Is Aashiq Dil Ka Na Aitbaar Karo
Roz Nikla Karen Kisi Ke Yaad Mein Aanso
Itna Kabhi Na Kisi Se Pyaar Karo

st: Har Dil Faryad Nahi Karta
s:
Har Dil Faryad Nahi Karta
Har Koi Kisi Ko Yaad Nahi Karta,
Bhool Jayein Aap Ko Ek Pal Kay Liye
Is Baat Par Dil Aitbar Nahi Karta

st: Bagair Jane Pehchane Iqrar Na Kijiye
s:
Bagair Jane Pehchane Iqrar Na Kijiye
Muskura Kar Dilo Ko Beqrar Na Kijiye
Phool Bhi Dey Jatay Hain Zakham Gehray
Har Phool Par Yun Aaitbar Na Kijiye

st: Yeh Such Hai Doston Kisi Se Pyaar Na Karna,
s:
Yeh Such Hai Doston Kisi Se Pyaar Na Karna,
Kabhi Kisi Ka Aitbaar Na Karna,
Tham Ke Khanjar Apne Hi Hathon Mein,
Bedardi Se Apne Dil Par Vaar Na Karna

st: Aashiqon Par Aitbaar Mat Karna
s:
Aashiqon Par Aitbaar Mat Karna
Dil Wale Bahot Kam Hote Hai
Pyar Karne Wale Tho Bahot Milte Hai
Par Pyar Nibhane Wale Bahot Kam Hote Hai

st: Main Ab Bhi Girte Howe Paniyo Ki Qaib Mai Hoon
s:
Main Ab Bhi Girte Howe Paniyo Ki Qaib Mai Hoon
Aik Aabshar Mere Char So Bhi Tak Hai
Koi Gumaan Mujhe Tum Se Door Kaise Kare
Ke Aitbar Mere Char So Abhi Tak Hai

st: Maut Par Bhi Hai Yakeen, Un Par Bhi Aetbaar Hai
s:
Maut Par Bhi Hai Yakeen, Un Par Bhi Aetbaar Hai
Dekhate Hai Pehle Kaun Aata Hai, Dono Ka Intizaar Hai

st: Duniya Mein Kisi SE Kabhi Pyaar Mat Karna
s:
Duniya Mein Kisi SE Kabhi Pyaar Mat Karna
Apne Aansu Is Tarah Bekar Mat Karna
Kaante To Phir Bhi Daman Tham Lete Hain
Phoolon Pe Is Tarah Kabhi Aitbaar Mat Karna

st: Jeene Ki Khwaish Me Har Roz Marte Hain
s:
Jeene Ki Khwaish Me Har Roz Marte Hain
Wo Aaye Na Aaye Hum Intezaar Karte Hain
Jutha Hi Sahi Mere Yaar Ka Vaada
Hum Sach Maankar Aitbar Karte Hain

st: Kismat Pe Aitbaar Kisko Hai
s:
Kismat Pe Aitbaar Kisko Hai
Mil Jaye Pyaar To Inkaar Kisko Hai
Kuchh Majburiyan Hai Zindagi Ki
Warna Tanhaiee Se Pyaar Kisko Hai
